body: It's been a while since I've read this

How do I say this its really good anyway lets get into the rating overall art is one of the best i have seen so far this really looks like the real thing and it makes me so happy the author put so much time and effort into this the plot is decent i felt like everything was going to fast but it does have 17 pages so i guess you gotta squeeze all the scenes in characters are amazing and are just like how they are in the anime overall a 8.1/10 also join my discord please we need more members https://discord.gg/NzYsEq82
not accurate. Usui's dick isn't big enough.
